description: Alex was about to get hitched when he found out his beau decided to partake in an orgy during his bachelor party. Alex decided the best way to get him back was to film himself getting a blow job from one of their mutual acquaintances. He always thought Alexander was cute but never had an opportunity. He jumped at the chance to help Alex get his ex-fiancee back and this video is the result of what happens when you get caught with your pants down. Alex planned on showing the video at the wedding reception and then getting the marriage annulled. We never did find out how all of that turned out though.
title: Pleasure Pole
